text: Pedro Jiménez Galán (April 1919 - 3 March 2021) was a Spanish politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. From 1977 until 1979, he was a member of the Congress of Deputies. He was also a political prisoner during the dictatorship of Francisco Franco. Jiménez Galán was born in Valdepeñas de Jaén, Spain.
